column4: Good night, I try to instal Ubunto for first time, my computer have the PS/2 mouse port, but I use serial mouse and, in the install process the mouse dont work, someone can help me ?
not sure how to fix your issue, but you could instead use the alternate cd, then you won't need a mouse during the install iirc
ubuntu.com, the download page as usual.  In the download options, you'll see the alternate cd for your architecture
